version_description:
• Major stability and performance improvements
• Improved user experience when browsing through tv show seasons.
• Major AirPlay related improvements
• Lots of important bug fixes

Send us feedback to hi@telly.com!
• Fixed a bug that prevented premium content from showing for some users
• Bugfixes and minor improvements.

- Hot fix Arabic login popup
إصلاح خلل في تسجيل الدخول بالعربي

تحسين أداء مشغل الفيديو

- Bug fixes
- Layout improvements for Arabic

- Better iOS 9 compatibility
- Layout improvements for Arabic
- Performance enhancements
- Bug fixes

- iOS 10 fixes

- Added free content
- iOS 10 fixes
General enhancements and fixes to improve your experience.

- Fixed profile actions button issues
- Enhanced application reliability

• You can now watch free content before creating an account

Minor enhancements
New Chromecast feature!
Bug fixes and improvements.

* New player
* iPhone X screen support

- Bug fixes

-A better working video player.
-Performance tweaks.
-Terms of use
- New design

We present to you, the new revamped Telly, after taking in serious consideration on the feedback and comments from our users.

The new App now comes with:
- A brand new logo, a user-friendly interface and design
- Ultrafast video load times
- The best freemium experience in the region and the fastest growing video platform

Sign up now to our premium membership and get:
- Access to premium and ad-free content
- Create your personalized watchlist to catch up on your favorite tv shows
This release welcome some improvements under hood, alongside some general bugs after release the new revamped Telly.

- Bug fixes and improvements
- Seamless Advertisement experience
- Push notifications now link directly to your favorite shows and movies

- Easily sharing your favorite shows and movies
- Bug fixes and improvements

- Resuming playbacks for premium users
- Automatically play next episode
- Bug fixes and improvements

- Video player with pinch to zoom
- Rate us
- Bug fixes and improvements

We're listening to your feedback and working hard to improve Telly. Here's what's new:
1. Bug fixes
2. Support for Apple TV

You can also download our Apple TV app directly on the tvOS App Store.
- Bug fixes and improvements
- Bug fixes and improvements
- Bug fixes and improvements

--New Player

We are introducing our new blazing fast video player for you to enjoy your favourite content.

--Bye-bye bugs, Hello enhancements!

Our team has been working very hard to resolve all issues and bugs you have reported.

--We'd love to hear from you

We value your feedback, the more feedback we get, whether it was positive or negative, will help us to serve you better and give you a better experience.
this is for the new app update
نقدم لكم مشغل الفيديو السريع الجديد على شان تستمتعون بالمحتوى اللي تحبونه


- باي باي للأخطاء ، هلا بالتحسينات !

فريقنا يشتغل بجد على شان يحل جميع المشكلات والأخطاء اللي تبلغون عنها.

- ودنا نسمع منك

احنا نقدر ملاحظاتك ، وكل ما حصلنا تعليقات أكثر ، سواء إيجابية أو سلبية ، بيساعدنا على خدمتك بشكل أفضل وتقديم تجربة أفضل.
Bug fixes and improvements

Your favorite platform for Arabic content; now back to you as Mahatat!

Mahatat is a leading Video-on-demand platform providing unlimited & exclusive TV shows & movies from the Arabian world. Mahatat offers the most extensive Khaleeji locally grown content library for you to enjoy!

Enjoy the best Arabic movies and series in HD on your Apple iPhone or iPad.

We took all your feedback into serious consideration and have brought to you:
A new design to make Mahatat more user friendly than it has ever been to make your experience seamless.
A 'watchlist' for you to add the movies & TV shows to watch for later, so you never forget about them!
Enhanced playback and shorter loading time so you can start watching instantly!
Now supporting Apple TV, will be supporting Chromecast, Smart TVs soon
The biggest Arabic celebrity database as a 'cast & crew' section, making it easier for you to search for movies or shows based on your favorite celebrity!
'Continue watching' option for Premium users to start where you left off.
Bug fixes and improvements
Minor bug fixes and improvements
